description:
About Mood Media:

Mood Media is the world’s leading in-store media solutions provider dedicated to Maximizing

the Customer Experience. We create greater emotional connections between brands and

consumers through the right combination of music, messaging, digital signage, AV systems and

scent. We reach more than 150 million consumers each day through more than 500,000

subscriber locations in 100+ countries around the globe.

Position Overview:

As the Marketing/Product Analytics Manager, you will play a critical role in shaping data-driven strategies to optimize marketing performance and enhance product offerings. The ideal candidate will have at least 6 years of experience and a master's degree in analytics or a related field.

Responsibilities:

Ecommerce Analytics Strategy: Develop and execute a comprehensive analytics strategy and roadmap to drive business insights, with a dual focus on marketing analytics and product analytics.

Data Integration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to integrate data from various sources, such as Magento, into a unified analytics platform.

Tool Management: Oversee the utilization of analytics tools, including Looker and Tableau, to effectively develop detailed dashboards and company-wide KPI reporting.

SQL and Python Proficiency: Leverage your deep knowledge of SQL and Python to extract, transform, and analyze data, providing actionable insights to stakeholders.

Marketing Analytics: Analyze marketing performance metrics, including customer acquisition, conversion rates, and ROI. Provide insights to optimize marketing strategies and assist in forecasting and projecting growth.

Product Analytics: Dive into product data to understand customer behavior, preferences, and identify opportunities for product improvements and enhancements. Assist in identifying opportunities in the customer lifecycle and whitespaces to improve customer experience and engagement.

Dashboard Development: Design and maintain dashboards that provide real-time visibility into key performance indicators for marketing and product teams.

Qualifications:
• 5+ years of experience in an analytical role (ecommerce, web-based company)
• Strong SQL and data visualization experience (Tableau, Looker, PowerBI)
• Experience with statistical packages like Python, R, etc … is a plus, but not required.
• Bachelors degree in Analytics, Data Science, or a related field.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Proven experience in marketing analytics and product analytics.
• Excellent communication and presentation skills.
• Leadership experience, with the ability to mentor and grow a team.

Don't worry about checking all the boxes, we’re committed to individuals who are excited to learn and grow with us.

California Disclaimer:

We process personal information (“PI”) of California job applicants in the human resources (“HR”) context. Mood Media may collect your PI directly from you, such as when you apply for a position or become employed or engaged by us (e.g., identification/identity data, contact details, educational and employment data), over the phone or through paper documents such as applications for employment and consents to perform employment screening, in our notes or records we create about you, from others through interactions in the course of employment or engagement, from third parties (e.g., references and recruiters), or from public sources of data. This notice is designed to meet obligations under the California Consumer Privacy Act, as amended by the California Privacy Rights Act (together, the “CCPA”).
